title: Saudi Arabia pledges net-zero greenhouse gas emissions by 2060
content:
1. Saudi Arabia pledges net-zero greenhouse gas emissions by 2060  NPR

  4. Prince Charles says "dangerously narrow window" to accelerate climate action  Reuters
